name: FakeCopperCable
title: Fake Copper Cable
author: FI
description:
Copper cable as craftable item removed.
Copper cable surrogates as recipe ingredients needed instead.
Copper cable shortcut now gives 200 items.
'Wire Shortcuts' are unlocked from the start.
Technology 'Circuit network' required for use of red wire and green wire shortcuts and their associated hotkeys.
Compatible with Angel's, Bob's and Amator's mods.
